designSystem.description: Comprehensive design system for NOOR landing page interactive components including particle effects, card animations, and navigation

components.purpose: Creates an animated 3D particle field using WebGL for immersive background effects on the hero section
components.visualDescription: Spherical cloud of floating particles with continuous rotation and optional mouse interaction. Particles gently float and pulse with customizable colors and sizes.
usageContext: Creates 'illumination' effect consistent with NOOR branding

defaultBehavior.rotation: Gentle x, y, z axis rotation

particleCount.description: Total number of particles to render
particleCount.performanceNote: Higher counts (>500) may impact performance on low-end devices

particleSpread.description: Controls the overall size of the particle cloud
particleSpread.visualImpact: Larger values create more dispersed, spacious feel

particleColors.description: Array of hex colors for particle palette. Particles randomly select from array.
particleColors.usage: Mix gold and white for NOOR brand consistency

moveParticlesOnHover.uxConsideration: Creates immersive interaction but may distract from content
moveParticlesOnHover.recommended: true for hero sections, false for sections with important content

particleHoverFactor.description: Multiplier for mouse parallax movement intensity

alphaParticles.description: Enables alpha transparency for softer, glowing particles

visualDifference.false: Sharp-edged circular particles with hard cutoff
visualDifference.true: Soft-edged glowing particles with smooth alpha falloff

particleBaseSize.description: Base size for particles (in WebGL units, affected by distance)
particleBaseSize.visualImpact: Higher values create larger, more prominent particles

sizeRandomness.description: Amount of random size variation between particles

cameraDistance.description: Camera distance from particle cloud center

disableRotation.whenToUse: Enable when rotation feels too busy or distracting
disableRotation.performanceNote: No performance benefit, purely aesthetic choice

className.description: Additional CSS classes for container div

mounting.behavior: Creates canvas element and appends to container on mount
mounting.cleanup: Removes canvas and cancels animation frame on unmount

performance.fallback: No automatic fallback - component won't render without WebGL

accessibility.prefersReducedMotion: Not currently implemented - should be added
accessibility.recommendation: Wrap in media query check or add prop to disable animation

responsive.behavior: Listens to window resize events and adjusts canvas size

browserSupport.notes: Will not render on browsers without WebGL support

components.purpose: Creates an automated stacked card animation that cycles through cards with 3D perspective effects
components.visualDescription: Stack of cards positioned with 3D depth. Front card periodically drops down and moves to back while remaining cards promote forward. Creates dynamic, engaging showcase effect.
usageContext: Dashboard preview showcase on landing page
Any content requiring sequential presentation with visual impact

layout.stackDirection: Cards recede in x, y, and z axes
layout.zIndex: Managed dynamically based on card order

width.description: Width of each card (px or CSS string)

height.description: Height of each card (px or CSS string)
height.aspectRatio: Maintains 3:4 portrait ratio in design system

cardDistance.visualImpact: Larger values = more spread out stack

pauseOnHover.description: Pauses animation when user hovers over component
pauseOnHover.uxBenefit: Allows users to examine current card without distraction

onCardClick.description: Callback fired when a card is clicked

skewAmount.description: Vertical skew applied to cards for 3D effect

easing.noorRecommended: elastic for hero sections, linear for professional contexts

Card.purpose: Wrapper for card content with consistent styling

customClass.description: Additional CSS classes for the card
customClass.usage: Override or extend default card styles

...rest.description: All standard div props are passed through

step1.name: Drop
step1.effect: Card appears to fall out of frame

step2.name: Promote
step2.action: Move forward one position in stack

step3.name: Return
step3.action: Moves to back position of stack

gsapUsage.timelines: Creates new timeline for each swap
gsapUsage.labels: Uses labels for precise timing coordination
gsapUsage.overwrite: Uses 'auto' overwrite mode for smooth transitions

responsive.overflow: Visible to allow cards to extend beyond container

accessibility.screenReader: Cards are standard divs, content should be semantic
accessibility.motion: No prefers-reduced-motion support - should be added

import CardSwap, { Card } from './components/CardSwap';

styling.containerClasses: absolute bottom-0 right-0 transform translate-x-[5%] translate-y-[20%] origin-bottom-right perspective-[900px] overflow-visible
styling.cardDefaults: absolute top-1/2 left-1/2 rounded-xl border border-white bg-black
styling.customization: Override via Card customClass prop or inline styles

browserSupport.fallback: Consider 2D transform fallback for older browsers

components.purpose: Premium animated navigation with pill-style links and sophisticated hover effects
components.visualDescription: Circular logo followed by rounded pill-shaped navigation items. On hover, circular background expands from bottom creating elegant reveal effect. Mobile: hamburger menu with slide-down dropdown.

animation.labelAnimation: Text slides up while white overlay slides in

routing.detection: Automatically detects internal vs external links

logo.description: URL or path to logo image
logo.format: Any image format (SVG, PNG, JPG, WebP)

activeHref.description: Current active route for visual indicator
activeHref.effect: Shows gold dot below active nav item

className.description: Additional CSS classes for nav element

hoveredPillTextColor.description: Text color when pill is hovered (white overlay text)
hoveredPillTextColor.usage: Color of text that appears during hover animation

onMobileMenuClick.description: Callback fired when mobile menu is toggled
onMobileMenuClick.usage: Track analytics or trigger side effects

initialLoadAnimation.description: Enables scale/width animation on component mount
initialLoadAnimation.recommendation: true for landing pages, false for instant render

ariaLabel.description: Accessibility label (defaults to label if not provided)

labelDefault.effect: Slides up and out of view

open.hamburger: Line 1: rotate 45deg, y: 3; Line 2: rotate -45deg, y: -3

layout.container: Full width on mobile, auto on desktop

hoverMechanism.calculation: Dynamically calculates circular background size based on pill dimensions
hoverMechanism.formula: R = (w² / 4 + h²) / (2h) where R is radius, w is width, h is height
hoverMechanism.positioning: Circle positioned to expand from bottom center
hoverMechanism.stateManagement: Timeline stored in ref, tweened on hover in/out

activeIndicator.element: Small circular dot below active pill

responsive.mobile: Logo + hamburger, dropdown menu on click

routing.detection: Checks if href starts with http://, https://, //, mailto:, tel:, or #
routing.benefits: No page reload for internal navigation, proper handling of external links

accessibility.keyboardNav: Not currently implemented - should be added
accessibility.focusIndicators: Should be added for WCAG compliance

performance.gsapTimelines: Created once per pill, reused on every hover
performance.tweenKilling: Properly kills active tweens before starting new ones
performance.layoutCalculations: Recalculated on window resize and font load
performance.fontLoading: Listens for document.fonts.ready to ensure accurate measurements

goldOnDark.visualEffect: Gold navigation bar with dark pills, text becomes dark on hover as gold background expands

whiteOnDark.visualEffect: White navigation bar with dark pills, clean and minimal

darkOnLight.description: Dark navigation on light background (if needed)
darkOnLight.visualEffect: Dark navigation bar with gold pills (inverted scheme)

styling.container: absolute top-[1em] z-[1000] w-full left-0 md:w-auto md:left-auto
styling.nav: w-full md:w-max flex items-center justify-between md:justify-start px-4 md:px-0
styling.navItems: relative items-center rounded-full hidden md:flex ml-2
styling.pill: relative overflow-hidden inline-flex items-center justify-center h-full rounded-full font-semibold text-[16px] uppercase tracking-[0.2px]
styling.hamburger: md:hidden rounded-full flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-1
styling.mobileMenu: md:hidden absolute top-[3em] left-4 right-4 rounded-[27px] shadow-[0_8px_32px_rgba(0,0,0,0.12)]
styling.customization: Extensive customization via props and CSS variables

mobileMenu.animation: Lines rotate to form X when open
mobileMenu.menuStyle: Dropdown below navigation with rounded corners
mobileMenu.behavior: Closes on item click or toggle

landingPageHero.description: Complete hero section with particles background and navigation

dashboardShowcaseSection.description: Section showcasing three dashboards with card animation
dashboardShowcaseSection.structure: CardSwap positioned in corner with dashboard preview cards

fullLandingPage.description: Complete NOOR landing page structure with all components

CardSwap: Alternative to grid on smaller screens

particles.optimization: Reduce particle count on mobile devices

cardSwap.mobile: Reduce card sizes and scale for better performance

pillNav.fontLoading: Wait for fonts before calculating sizes

general.imageOptimization: Use WebP with fallbacks, responsive images
general.prefersReducedMotion: Respect user motion preferences (implement across all components)

improvements: ARIA live regions for dynamic content
testing: Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)

deploymentChecklist: All components tested across target browsers
